text: Wilhelm Schraml (26 June 1935 â€“ 8 November 2021) was a German Roman Catholic prelate. He was a bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Passau.Bischof emeritus Wilhelm Schraml spendet Firmlingen den Segen , Heimat Zeitung, 4 July 2014 He became a priest in 1961. In 1986 he became an Auxiliary Bishop of Regensburg. On 8 March 1986, he became titular bishop of Munatiana. In 2001, he became bishop of Passau. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2021 deaths Category:German Roman Catholic bishops
title: Wilhelm Schraml
